tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomicsStudies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  organism VARCHAR(255),
  sequencing_technology VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
    data_type VARCHAR(20),
    data_value TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE genomics_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  variant_type VARCHAR(50),
  genomic_position INT,
  sample_id INT,
  data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE proteomics_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_name VARCHAR(255),
  protein_id INT,
  expression_level FLOAT,
  sample_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE metabolomics_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  metabolite_name VARCHAR(255),
  metabolite_id INT,
  concentration FLOAT,
  sample_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE sample_metadata (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  study_type VARCHAR(50),
  study_description TEXT,
  data_source VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE study_metadata (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  study_id INT,
  study_name VARCHAR(255),
  study_description TEXT,
  researcher_id INT
)
